# set up -----------------------------

library(RPostgreSQL)
source("W:\\RDA Team\\R\\credentials_source.R")

# library(devtools)
# remotes::install_github("catalystcalifornia/rdaCharts") 
library(rdaCharts)
library(stringr)
library(gt)
library(htmltools)
library(htmlwidgets)
library(gtExtras)

#connect to postgres

source("W:\\RDA Team\\R\\credentials_source.R")

con <- connect_to_db("eci_fresno_ripa")

# pull analysis table for visualizing


df<-dbGetQuery(con, "SELECT * FROM report_traffic_reason_race")%>%
mutate(race_label = case_when(
    race == 'latinx' ~ "Latinx", 
    race =='nh_white' ~ 'White',
    race =='nh_black' ~ 'Black',
    race == 'nh_asian' ~ 'Asian',
   race == 'nh_multiracial' ~ 'Multiracial',
    race == 'aian_aoic' ~ 'AIAN',
    race == 'nh_aian' ~ 'AIAN NH',
    race == 'nhpi_aoic' ~ 'NHPI',
   race == 'nh_nhpi' ~ 'NHPI NH',
    race == 'sswana_aoic' ~ 'SWANA/SA', 
   race == 'nh_sswaba' ~ 'SWANA/SA NH', 
    TRUE ~ as.character(race)))%>%
  filter(count>=10) # filter to where at least 10 people were stopped

# split separate dfs for each denominator option

df_race<-df%>%
  filter(denom=="traffic_stop_race" &
            total >= 10)%>% # I think this denominator is the best one for visualizing
filter(statute_literal_25 !="UNSAFE SPEED:PREVAIL COND") 


df_reason<-df%>%
  filter(denom=="traffic_reason" & count >=10)

# visualize RACE denom--------------------------


# create caption 

sourcenote<-"Catalyst California calculations based on City of Fresno's Police Stop Data (2022), catalystcalifornia.org, 2024. "

methodnote <- "Analysis for all officer-initiated stops made by officers in 2022."

racenote <- "Race/ethnicity: AIAN=American Indian or Alaska Native, NHPI=Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander, SWANA/SA=Southwest Asian (Middle Eastern) or North African, or South Asian."

caption_text <- paste("<br>", sourcenote, methodnote)

# create tooltip text

tooltip_text <- "Out of all the people Fresno PD stopped in traffic and perceived as <b>{point.race_label}</b>, <b>{point.rate:.1f}%</b> of those people were stopped for the reason of <b>{point.statute_literal_25}</b>, or a total of <b>{point.count:.1f}</b> people."


# run function

chart_race<-rdaStackedBar(
  df_race,
  "race",
  "rate",
  "statute_literal_25",
  title = "Denom 1: Out of all reasons within each racial group",
  subtitle = "Percent of officer-initiated traffic stops by stop reason and perceived race",
  tooltip_text = tooltip_text,
  caption = caption_text,
  export_data_label = list(pointFormat='{point.rate:.1f}%')
)




#Visualize REASON denom------------------------------------------

# create caption 

sourcenote<-"Catalyst California calculations based on City of Fresno's Police Stop Data (2022), catalystcalifornia.org, 2024. "

methodnote <- "Analysis for all officer-initiated stops made by officers in 2022."

racenote <- "Race/ethnicity: AIAN=American Indian or Alaska Native, NHPI=Native Hawaiian or Pacific Islander, SWANA/SA=Southwest Asian (Middle Eastern) or North African, or South Asian."

caption_text <- paste("<br>", sourcenote, methodnote)

# create tooltip text

tooltip_text <- "Out of all of the people stopped in traffic for the reason of <b>{point.statute_literal_25}</b>,  <b>{point.rate:.1f}%</b> of those people were perceived by Fresno PD as <b>{point.race_label}</b>, or a total of <b>{point.count:.1f}</b> people."



chart_reason<-rdaStackedBar(
  df_reason,
  "statute_literal_25",
  "rate",
  "race",
  title = "Denom 2: Out of all people stopped per stop reason",
  subtitle = "Percent of officer-initiated traffic stops by stop reason and perceived race",
  tooltip_text = tooltip_text,
  caption = "caption_text",
  export_data_label = list(pointFormat='{point.rate:.1f}%')
)
